channel.title: Holyshit
channel.description:
I just finished watching "A Game of Thrones" and I'll probably read and finish them before season two.The last two episodes gave me chills half the time, and the ending was just perfect. Who ever created the TV show should have my first born child, and to the author, George R. R. Martin, you shall have the second.Anyone else fans? - I took screenshots of the ending parts, they're amazing enough to capture.
Anyone who doesn't know what "A Game of Thrones" is, it's the first book in the series "A Song of Fire and Ice". Read about it, or the series, here: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/A_Game_of_Thrones

item.title: Holyshit
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

[quote=“Native^, post:10, topic:431687”][quote author=ox random xi link=topic=534391.msg3907648#msg3907648 date=1328391798]

inb4 jagex makes this into an mmorpg

Ha, I had a chuckle there. They haven’t even finished Stellar Dawn.

Thought it died.
[/quote]
Neh, first it was called MechScape or something. That died. Now they rewrote it and gave it another name.[/quote]

No it was supposed to be released in 2011 but it’s 2012 and no recent announcements. It’s dead.

Read full topic
